creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text: Hopefully I categorized this right -- I was trying out the org.apache.regexp package when I hit an odd omission: the RE class is not Serializable... which means the classes that use it cannot be saved out as files for JavaBeans and whatnot without some fancy footwork. Is there a reason why it cannot implement Serializable?

creator: gholam@xtra.co.nz
text:
I will have a look into this and see if there are reasons for not having RE
implement serializable.

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19329 ***
